title: Uptick in rural demand to propel two-wheeler industry: TVS Motor chief
description: TVS Motor Chairman Ralf Speth forecasted growth in the domestic two-wheeler segment due to normal rainfall and rising rural demand. He highlighted TVS's commitment to EVs, international expansion, and partnership with BMW for developing new vehicles. Economic indicators and strategic collaborations are expected to drive growth and innovation.
